title: Oceanic Gaming Network's 1v1 Tournament. (01/04/18)

embed.description: Oceanic Gaming Network's LoL Tournament. Map is Howling Abyss.

body:
Hey everyone,

Oceanic Gaming Network is hosting a 1v1 tournament this Sunday, 01/04/18. 

Map will be howling abyss with first to destroy opponents tower wins.

Prizes include a Copy of Dark Souls 3 and its expansion with further winnings to be confirmed. 

For further information head to the above link or head to our discord here: https://discord.gg/y6G4EqE 

Hope to see you all there :)
